resources.string:
Thanks to everyone who has donated Your support is appreciated and helps support the app.
 See http://www.cadpage.org/financial-support for more details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 The new Config Widget has been Updated (less crashing) ! Long Press on an empty part of your home screen to add the new 1x4 widget.
 Instructions on use are on the webpage under UserManual and on the Facebook Page.
 MMS Support is here!!!
 This is highly experimental. Your mileage may vary. See http://www.cadpage.org/faq/mms-message-support for details
 
 Multiple Fixes for Existing Locations and Issues
 New Locations:
 New District:York County,ME
 Rename Bergen County, NJ to MICOM, NJ
 New District: Northampton, VA
 New District: Stone County, MO and Barry County, MO
 Fixes:
 Mapping problem with Benton County, OR
 All text messages getting treated as general alerts
 Parsing problem with Gasconade County, MO
 Parsing problem with Broome County, NY location
 Parsing problem with Suffolk County (B), NY
 Parsing problem with Bucks County, PA
 Parsing problem with Chester County (B), PA
 Parsign problems with Pueblo County, CO
 Parsing problems with Prince Georges County
 Parsing problem with Nash County, NC
 Parsing problem with Cumberland County, NC
 Fixed minor parsing problem with Northampton County, PA
